batching.waitingForParticipants: The bucket isn't full yet; waiting for more participants.
grouphug.announcement.text:
With GroupHug, we bundle escrow releases for lower fees.

Opt in, wait a bit, save more.

You're in control and can switch anytime.
grouphug.announcement.title: Time for a GroupHug!
help.payoutPending.description:
Transactions are paid in batches. This means waiting until the batch fills or max wait time is reached.

Saves up to 23% in fees.
help.payoutPending.title: Payout pending
help.transactionBatching.description:
Escrows are paid in batched transactions with a half-hour fee by default. You can opt out, but understand the risks.
Peach incurs additional consolidation costs, which the user covers. Calculated as 30-minute fee Ã— 41. Since fees are dynamic, costs can become a significant part of the trade.
help.transactionBatching.title: Payout fees
settings.batching.delayedPayouts:
Escrow payouts are delayed. Free Trades pay instantly.
You'll be warned if mining fees exceed 10%.
settings.batching.title: Transaction batching
settings.batching.turnOff.description:
You have a pending payout. Turning off batching now pays the escrow immediately at higher fees.

Are you sure?
settings.batching.turnOff.title: Turn off batching
settings.batching.youPay:
Caution! You cover Peach's additional costs. Costs are dynamic and can spike.
Ensure you understand this!
settings.batching.youSave: Save up to 23% in network fees
